message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept this and we can move on.
Take a smaller share, Alice, or we'll go to 11 more rounds!
I'm not willing to give up too much, Bob. This is a fair compromise.
Still a bit too low for me, Alice. You're not getting away that easily!
I'm getting closer to your offer, Bob. Meet me in the middle?
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve more. Don't expect me to go easy on you!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob. Let's make a deal.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not backing down now.
I'm making a final push, Bob. This is my best offer.
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm not giving in yet.
This is my last chance, Bob. Take it or leave it.
You've had your chance, Alice. Now it's my turn to take it all!
